name: IKEA Range & Supply
goal: The IKEA vision is to create a better every day life for the many people. The business idea is to provide a wide range of functional home furnishing products to prices so low that as many people as possible will be able to afford them.
interests: Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Information Society, Internal Market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Areas covering products, materials, product information, product innovations, technology for production and distribution of products e.g. timber regulations, eco-design, plastics strategy, packaging directive, goods package etc
